channel.title: Counterfactual Reasoning on Sunay Bhat
channel.description: Recent content in Counterfactual Reasoning on Sunay Bhat

item.title: De-Biasing Generative Models using Counterfactual Methods
item.description: Causal Counterfactual Generative Model (CCGM) is a VAE-based framework with a partially trainable causal layer that learns causal relationships, enabling de-biased dataset generation from biased training data.
